about_the_game:
Are you an aspiring modder or have you been inspired by the creations you’ve found on Pilgrim Outpost? If you want to get into modding Dying Light 2 Stay Human, we have the tools for you! Become part of our great modding community and share your creations with your friends playing on PC or consoles, thanks to our cross-platform mod support.

Our Developer Tools are equipped with everything you need, so you can just let your imagination run wild! Use the Map Editor to create amazing-looking locations that tell stories of their very own; whether they be cityscapes, mountain ridges, or secret underground labs packed with suspicious machinery! Then, with the Story Editor, you can fill your map with quests and top it all off with the Dialogue Editor. Will you tell a tale of conquest? Self-discovery? Missing shoes? Vacations ruined by an undead horde?

We’ve also expanded the assets library for the Map Editor, so taking your story outside the walls of Villedor is now even easier! You can revisit the nostalgic favelas, tropical beaches, deep dungeons, and more with assets from:

  • Dying Light
  • Dead Island
  • Bloody Ties DLC
  • Hellraid DLC

And this is just the start, we have plans for more assets to be added to the Map Editor library in 2024 and beyond!

The Developer Tools DLC features:
  • Map Editor
  • Story Editor
  • Dialogue Editor

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
